solution_line_template: First find the size of the second-biggest doll: {biggest_doll_height} cm * {size_ratio} = <<{biggest_doll_height}*{size_ratio}={second_doll_height}>>{second_doll_height} cm
Then find the size of the third-biggest doll: {second_doll_height} cm * {size_ratio} = <<{second_doll_height}*{size_ratio}={third_doll_height}>>{third_doll_height} cm
Then find the size of the fourth-biggest doll: {third_doll_height} cm * {size_ratio} = <<{third_doll_height}*{size_ratio}={fourth_doll_height}>>{fourth_doll_height} cm
Then find the size of the fifth-biggest doll: {fourth_doll_height} cm * {size_ratio} = <<{fourth_doll_height}*{size_ratio}={fifth_doll_height}>>{fifth_doll_height} cm
Then find the size of the sixth-biggest doll: {fifth_doll_height} cm * {size_ratio} = <<{fifth_doll_height}*{size_ratio}={sixth_doll_height}>>{sixth_doll_height} cm
